task_description: Facing the building to your South (approx. 177°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I need to see the full height of the building to estimate it, so I will start by looking up to find the roofline.
My heading has incorrectly reset to North; I need to turn back to face the building at approximately 178° South while maintaining my upward pitch to see the roof.
My pitch was reset, so I need to look up again to see the top of the building to estimate its full height.
My heading has been reset to North again; I must first rotate back to face the building at 178° South before I can continue assessing its height.
I am facing the correct building but my pitch is at 0 degrees, so I will look up by 30 degrees to see the top of the building.
My heading has been reset to North again after I tried to look up; I need to rotate back to face the building at 178° South to reorient myself.
I am facing the building, but I need to see the top to estimate the height, so I will look up.
My heading has been reset to North again after looking up; I need to rotate back to 178° South to face the building before I can attempt to view its full height.
I am facing the building, and now I will look up to see the top and then look down to see the base to make a height estimation.
My heading has reset to North again after looking up; I must rotate back to 178° South to face the building before I can proceed.
I am facing the building and will now look up to see the roofline, then look down to see the base, to gather the visual information needed for a height estimate.
My heading has reset to North again after looking up; I must rotate back to 178° South to face the building before I can proceed.
I am facing the building and will now look up to see the roofline, then look down to see the base, to gather the visual information needed for a height estimate.
My heading has reset to North again after looking up; I must rotate back to 178° South to face the building before I can proceed.
I have repeatedly tried to look up and have been reset; I will now try looking down to see the base of the building, which is the other piece of information I need for a height estimate.
My heading has reset to North again after looking down; I must rotate back to 178° South to face the building before I can proceed.

Given the repeated technical issue of my heading resetting when I change pitch, I will make an estimate based on the central view, assuming a standard floor height of about 3 meters and counting the visible floors.
